title: 198 - The Mono-Wheel Miracle
description: Today’s episode of The POD kicks off with a full hause of characters discussing the latest events in their lives. Mitt is back with a new Mustang while Connor shares a truly life changing experience. With the rather candid start The boys then jump into the POD Fod, which is a folder compiled of all things around the internet. Today’s FOD includes John Cena’s response to The Rock and Vin’s beef, a Clash of clans update, a pigeon infestation of Ty’s hometown, and much much more. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.come/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Wednesday, Cheers.
